ABOUT JONATHAN 
Yorba Linda, CA

I am a programmer of things. I immmensely enjoy coding, debugging, and testing. In every project I strive to create frictionless experiences for users through an iterative agile workflow of testing and analysis. A directed curiosity and being a fast learner are my biggest strengths.
